folderStructure.name: Folder Structure
folderStructure.desc: Choose the folder structure for daily notes

folderFormat.title: Folder Format Settings
folderFormat.desc: Customize the format of year, month, and week folders.

year.name: Year Format
year.desc: Format for year folders (e.g., YYYY, YY)

month.name: Month Format
month.desc: Format for month folders (e.g., MM, M, MMMM)

week.name: Week Format
week.desc: Format for week folders (e.g., W, WW, Wo)
